SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.mapper

Interface CycleMapper

public interface CycleMapper
MapStruct mapper interface for converting between CycleEntity and its DTO representations.

Features:

  • Automatic mapping between CycleEntity, CycleDTO, and CycleUpdateDTO
  • Handles mapping of nested admin and evaluations fields, mapping admin to adminId
  • Supports mapping of collections (lists) of cycles and DTOs
  • Prevents circular references by mapping only IDs for admin
  • Ignores sensitive or unnecessary fields as needed for security and clarity
  • Provides update methods for partial entity updates from DTOs

Usage: This interface is implemented automatically by MapStruct at build time. Inject or obtain an instance via CDI or the generated implementation for use in your service layer.

  • Method Details

    • toDto

      CycleDTO toDto(CycleEntity cycleEntity)
      Maps a CycleEntity to a CycleDTO.

      Maps the admin relationship to just the admin ID to prevent circular references. Includes evaluations as a list of DTOs.

      Parameters:
      cycleEntity - the entity to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped DTO, or null if input is null

    • toEntity

      CycleEntity toEntity(CycleDTO cycleDTO)
      Maps a CycleDTO to a CycleEntity.

      Ignores admin, state, id, and evaluations fields; set these in the service layer if needed.

      Parameters:
      cycleDTO - the DTO to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped entity, or null if input is null

    • toDtoList

      List<CycleDTO> toDtoList(List<CycleEntity> cycles)
      Maps a list of CycleEntity objects to a list of CycleDTO objects.
      Parameters:
      cycles - the list of entities to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped list of DTOs (empty if input is empty or null)

    • toEntityList

      List<CycleEntity> toEntityList(List<CycleDTO> cycleDTOs)
      Maps a list of CycleDTO objects to a list of CycleEntity objects.
      Parameters:
      cycleDTOs - the list of DTOs to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped list of entities (empty if input is empty or null)

    • updateEntityFromDto

      void updateEntityFromDto(CycleUpdateDTO cycleUpdateDTO, CycleEntity cycleEntity)
      Updates an existing CycleEntity with values from a CycleUpdateDTO.

      Useful for partial updates while preserving existing entity relationships and IDs. Ignores admin and id fields to avoid accidental changes.

      Parameters:
      cycleUpdateDTO - the DTO containing the new values
      cycleEntity - the existing entity to update (modified in place)
